pageContext.other: 2 cross section drawings of dirk on reverse.,Rivet holes at very bottom of base, holes are intact.  Base also includes 2 protrusions (one rounded, one pointed and likely broken or worn away) before narrowing to blade.  Blade cross section is a squashed oval.,Edge appears relatively intact on one side but chipped or otherwise corroded on the other.
pageContext.associations: Found among the Pale-dwellings, with many other objects.
